General.Name: Inter-Delta Tbk
General.Description: PT Inter Delta Tbk engages in the trading of film equipment, microfilms, chemicals for photography, and electronic equipment in Indonesia. Its products include photo printing papers, films and cameras, photo and paper processing chemicals, and others. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Inter Delta Tbk is a subsidiary of Peak Aim Development Ltd.
General.Address: Jl. Gaya Motor Barat, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14330
